head.title: Please select desired analysis properties
head.description: only first 50 variables are shown, type to filter others or select ALL switch

predictor.title: Predictor variables
predictor.description: A predictor variable is a variable used in ML to predict another variable
predictor.placeholder: Please select predictor variables, type to search...

predictor_exclude.title: Exclude predictors
predictor_exclude.description:
If you selected to use ALL Predictors in Select ALL switch, you can exclude some of them by selecting them here.
To use this function select ALL switch must be turned on!
